rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment discusses testing plans using neutral language.
The segment describes a future action ('will test').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports plans/actions but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation about risk, cases, or impact.
Describes a future action/testing ('department will test other flocks') factually without active reassurance.
